lead_paragraph: Angel Feliz-Volquez, 26, was charged on Monday with killing Carmen Torres-Gonzalez, 59, with the 20-inch weapon outside her mother’s apartment in a Bronx public housing project.

byline.contributor: Noah Remnick contributed reporting, and Susan C. Beachy contributed research.
byline.original: By AL BAKER and BENJAMIN MUELLER

snippet: Angel Feliz-Volquez, 26, was charged on Monday with killing Carmen Torres-Gonzalez, 59, with the 20-inch weapon outside her mother’s apartment in a Bronx public housing project.

headline.main: Suspect in Machete Killing in the Bronx Said Neighbors Spied on Him, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Machete Killing Said Neighbors Spied on Him, Officials Say

abstract: Angel Feliz-Volquez is charged with murdering Carmen Torres-Gonzalez with machete in Bronx public housing complex where both resided; Feliz-Volquez tells detectives  neighbors, including Torres-Gonzalez, were spying on him.
